body_html:
@jeasinema I recently ran into a similar issue and it seems you are right about the condition of values.
Your code runs fine, if batch size is 1 and there are 2 values in the time dimension:

x1 = torch.ones(1, 3, 2)
model = nn.BatchNorm1d(3)
model(x1)

body:
@jeasinema I recently ran into a similar issue and it seems you are right about the condition of values.
Your code runs fine, if batch size is 1 and there are 2 values in the time dimension:
```
x1 = torch.ones(1, 3, 2)
model = nn.BatchNorm1d(3)
model(x1)
```
